channel.title: CVE Feed for Pepro Dev. Group -- PeproDev Ultimate Invoice
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pepro Dev. Group -- PeproDev Ultimate Invoice

item.title: CVE-2024-49298|2024-10-17T19:16:25.163Z -- pepro%20dev.%20group -- peprodev%20ultimate%20invoice
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Pepro Dev. Group PeproDev Ultimate Invoice allows Stored XSS.This issue affects PeproDev Ultimate Invoice: from n/a through 2.0.6.
